did.abstract: Two letters regarding Charles Goater: one 1860 letter from Charles Goater to brother describing movements of family members, residences, and the landscape of Brooklyn and one 1865 letter of administration naming Charles Goater of Sydney, New South Wales, Australia as executor of the will of Thomas Sheppard of the same place.

bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: Goater's son, Walter Goater (1852-1933), lived in Brooklyn, N.Y., where he worked as an artist and illustrator and was married to Anne (Carr) Goater (1858-1933). It is not known if Charles Goater himself ever resided in Brooklyn.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Material found in repository added to collection by Lena Evers-Hillstrom in November 2018. The name of the collection was updated at this time to better reflect the contents of the collection. This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: One letter of administration naming Charles Goater of Sydney, New South Wales, Australia as executor of the will of Thomas Sheppard of the same place, dated January 13, 1865.

One 1860 letter from Charles Goater to brother describing movements of family members, residences, and the landscape of Brooklyn. The letter also contains replies from Charles' father, J.P. Goater, and other family members.
